DOC.brief_title: Evaluation GTX™ 5126 DES Coronary Stent System Treatment Patients With Lesion Coronary Artery
DOC.criteria: Key Patient discrete de novo lesion coronary artery symptomatic ischemic heart disease Planned treatment one lesion single stent Denovo type A , B1 lesion Reference diameter 3.0 3.5mm lesion length 5 16mm Key Diabetic ( HbA1C > 6.0 ) Platelet count < 100000 cells/mm3 > 700000 cells/mm3 ; WBC < 3000 cells/mm3 ; hemoglobin < 10 g/dl Renal dysfunction creatinine > 2.0 mg/dl Patient know predilatation ejection fraction ( EF ) less forty five ( < 45 % ) Myocardial infarction ( MI ) less 3 month prior intervention Patient type B2 , C lesion Reference artery diameter < 3.0 > 3.6 mm Target lesion length < 5mm > 16 mm Other stenosis > 50 % target vessel Known hypersensitivity contraindication aspirin , clopidogrel , ticlopidine , cobalt chromium , sensitivity contrast agent , opinion investigator , adequately premedicated .
